price: Wala hawatoi cha kutoa kidogo wala kikubwa, wala hawalivuki bonde, ila huandikiwa, ili Mwenyezi Mungu awalipe bora ya waliyo kuwa wakiya- tenda.
arabic: وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ نَفَقَةٗ صَغِيرَةٗ وَلَا كَبِيرَةٗ وَلَا يَقۡطَعُونَ وَادِيًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمۡ لِيَجۡزِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحۡسَنَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Na kadhaalika Mujaahidina hawatoi mali wanayo toa, kingi na kidogo, wala hawasafiri safari yoyote, kwa Njia ya Mwenyezi Mungu ila huandikiwa katika madaftari ya vitendo vyao vyema, ili wapate malipo wanayo stahiki kuyapata hao watendao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā yunfiqūna nafaqatan ṣaghīratan walā kabīratan walā yaqṭaʿūna wādiyan illā kutiba lahum liyajziyahumu al-lahu aḥsana mā kānū yaʿmalūna
